title: Mad Moral
description: Featured Title on iTunesThe lineup of infamous slashers - Freddy Krueger, Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees - inducts another, Ford Fischer.In a world where their existence is truth, Ford struggles to fight the madness lurking in the shadowed recesses of his mind, fearing his destined lifestyle will topple what's left of his mental stability.Meanwhile, a vigilante stalks the streets targeting slashers as desired victims.His life at risk, Ford halts his quest for stability and adopts a new mindset - slash or be slashed.Ford's tale, coupled with a romantically conflicted exorcist and an officer whose dream redefine night terrors, leads us through a world that can be best defined as mad.
author: Kevin  Anthony
